metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10471 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.10.x allowing x86 PV guest OSusers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds zero write and hypervisorcrash) via unexpected INT 80 processing, because of an incorrect fix forCVE-2017-5754.

criterions.comment: xen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
